definitions.text: a decisive defeat in a game (especially in cribbage)
abrupt up-and-down motion (as caused by a ship or other conveyance)
examples: the pitching and tossing was quite exciting

definitions.text: the act of moving forward suddenly
walk as if unable to control one's movements
examples: The drunken man staggered into the room
The ship suddenly lurched to the left
The truck lurched down the road

definitions.text: loiter about, with no apparent aim
